title.rendered: Tuff Table Tops, MFC – various sizes, top only.

content.rendered:
Our Tuff Top Table Tops are made from contract grade MFC Laminate with a chipboard core and come in various sizes and finishes to suit your needs as well as provide an abundance of valuable features.

Our Tuff Top Table Tops come with a 2mm impact resistant ABS edge to provide longevity in your busy restaurant, cafe, bar, pub and more!

The manufacturing process of these table tops ensures that they are easy to clean and heat resistant up to 90 degrees centigrade! 

We hold various sizes and finishes in stock, but can also produce these table tops in virtually any size. Perfect for commercial establishments.

In addition to above features, this item is made in the UK and are pleased to offer a 5 year structural warranty on these items.

Please note, this item is for a table top only. Our table bases can be purchased separately.
